page.title: 20SCHOOL, WITHERNSEA
page.content:
We do lots of different things at school, such as English,Mathematics, Art and Craft, Drama, Games and Computer Studies. There are also clubs after school where children can do gymnastics, badminton, photography and computer programming. My favourite subject is English and I particularly enjoy writing stories. In my spare time I enjoy reading, playing football and riding my bicycle. I have just passed my cycling proficiency test at school and I received a certificate and badge.We had to show an examiner that we could ride a bicycle safely and that we knew the Highway Code. Nicholas Long, 10.
Material for this survey was produced by several staff and numerous pupils at the High School and by the class of Mr.D.Gowthorpe at the Junior School.
